Dear Mr. Skornia:
During the latter part of last summer I wrote to you concerning
some information about the NAEB and also for suggestions concerning
our television series. Perhaps you do not recall the correspondence
now, however I thought perhaps you would be interested in the progress
we have made with our series up to this time. We were fortunate in
securing Class A time for the program and I have had much cooperation
from the faculty and staff of the school. Because this was the first
organized production of television or radio at the school I was
particularly happy about the outcome of the first three programs In
our regular series and the one special program we produced.
The local station, WSPA-TV has been more than generous with their
time and effort in helping us promote the show and produce it. We
have several promotion slides and a sound-on-film promotion for the
regular series. All I need do before each program Is supply copy for
the slides. In conjunction with the radio and tv promotion we send
additional copy to the newspapers in the viewing area.
I have enclosed two of our broschures which we sent to alumni
over the state of South Carolina. The blue folder gives the schedule
for our regular series, while the yellow one is for a special one-time
show we just finished on WBT in Charlotte, NÂ«C#, and over the local
station. The latter program was produced for the purpose of climaxing
our annual alumni fund drive.
Ifm not trying to attach a particular significance to our series
of programs, nor am I saying they are the best to be found. They are,
however, the first for this school and so far have met with successful
response from the alumni and friends. Next year we wish to produce
a series with more public significance and less Wofford centered.
I would appreciate very much your criticisms or comments about
the programs and anyone else who wishes to comment may do so. It is
our desire to produce programs that use the medium to the best possible
advantage.
A
If the fact that this is the first program series for the school
has any Newsletter value, you may use any of this material. And, if
you wish any further information please let me know and I will be happy
to furnish it.
